name: DIY The Everyday Dress in Grey Kit
description:
A girl's version of "the little black dress". Classy, sweet, and simple.

Our design includes an adjustable pleat to not only enhance the beauty of the dress, but to also ensure the best fit for your child. By making the pleats wider or narrower, you can accommodate a wider or narrower build.

As your child grows, you can remove the pleat or adjust it to prolong the wearable life of the garment, allowing it to age beautifully into a tunic or a top!

Kit comes with all pre-cut fabric patterns, notions and embellishments, and easy-to-follow instructions.
